text:
In response to the #coronavirus outbreak, we announced that hundreds of NHS hospitals will be rid of historic debt amounting to £13.4 billion❌

This will free hospitals up to invest in maintaining vital services. 

See how your region will benefit 🔽 https://t.co/f7o1s3VJTV

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus
